page.title: 02TY SIGN ESTATE
page.content: We live on the Ty Sign Estate. This is a large estate of houses built above the town of RISCA which is about 4 miles from NEWPORT. The estate was first built about 20 years ago and was originally solely a council estate built for workers at the then new LLANWERN steel works. The streets on the original estate are all named after trees (Elm Drive, Sycamore Crescent, Forsythia Close etc). Today there are two large private estates on the site as well and always more building going on. There are not many social facilities on the estate, just one pub, one club and two churches but there are more in Risca which is only minutes away. There is a lot of unemployment among the people on the estate, especially since the steel works was "streamlined" some years ago.
